Create Arrow Files

createArrowFiles.Rd

This function will create an Arrow Files from input files for downstream analysis

createArrowFiles(inputFiles = NULL, sampleNames = NULL,
  outputNames = paste0("./", sampleNames), geneAnno = NULL,
  genomeAnno = NULL, filterFrags = 1000, filterTSS = 4,
  removeFilteredCells = TRUE, minFrags = 500,
  outDir = "QualityControl", nucLength = 147, TSSParams = list(),
  excludeChr = c("chrM", "chrY"), nChunk = 5, bcTag = "qname",
  gsubExpression = NULL, bamFlag = NULL, offsetPlus = 4,
  offsetMinus = -5, addTileMat = TRUE, TileMatParams = list(),
  addGeneScoreMat = TRUE, GeneScoreMatParams = list(), force = FALSE,
  threads = 1, parallelParam = NULL, verboseHeader = TRUE,
  verboseAll = FALSE, ...)

Arguments

inputFiles

input files (tabixFile, bamFile or textFile)
sampleNames

sample names corresponding to input files
outputNames

output names prefix (ie PBMC -> PBMC.arrow)
geneAnno

geneAnnotation input for TSS Scores etc.
genomeAnno

genomeAnnotation input for ChromSizes Nucleotide Information etc.
filterFrags

min fragments per cell to be filtered for analyses such as tileMat etc.
filterTSS

min TSS Score per cell to be filtered for analyses such as tileMat etc.
removeFilteredCells

remove fragments corresponding to cells pass filterFrags and filterTSS
minFrags

min fragments per cell to be immediately filtered
outDir

out directory for QC information from sample to be plotted / saved
nucLength

nucleosome length for id'ing fragments as sub-, mono-, or multi-nucleosome spanning
TSSParams

TSS parameters for computing TSS scores
excludeChr

exclude these chromosomes from analysis downstream (does not apply to fragments)
nChunk

number of chunks per chromosome when reading in input files
bcTag

barcode tag location in bam file (see ScanBam in Rsamtools)
bamFlag

list of bam flags for reading in fragments from input files (see ScanBam in Rsamtools)
offsetPlus

Tn5 offset of "+" stranded insertion (see Buenrostro 2013)
offsetMinus

Tn5 offset of "-" stranded insertion (see Buenrostro 2013)
addTileMat

addTileMatrix to ArrowFiles
TileMatParams

additional parameters to pass to addTileMatrix (see addTileMatrix)
addGeneScoreMat

addGeneScoreMatrix to ArrowFiles
GeneScoreMatParams

additional parameters to pass to addGeneScoreMatrix (see addGeneScoreMatrix)
force

force creation of arrow files if already exist
threads

number threads for parallel execution
parallelParam

parallel parameters for batch style execution
...

additional args

Contents

  • Arguments
